You cannot edit this page. Go ahead, try. Make my day ~ ZeroLSTN

I did it. ~ GitCenter

# Bitcoin

**Bitcoin** is a digital asset and a payment system invented by [[Satoshi Nakamoto]], who published the invention in 2008 and released it as [[open-source]] software in 2009. The system is [[peer-to-peer]]; users can transact directly without an intermediary. Transactions are verified by network [[nodes]] and recorded in a public distributed ledger called the [[blockchain]]. 

The ledger uses bitcoin as its unit of account. The system works without a central repository or single administrator, which has led the U.S. Treasury to categorize bitcoin as a decentralized virtual currency. Bitcoin is often called the first [[cryptocurrency]], although prior systems existed. Bitcoin is more correctly described as the first decentralized digital currency. It is the largest of its kind in terms of total market value.

## External links

[Bitcoin Wiki](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Pqq7TeAyCdVDqm2EN6PE9QVKHawzWyFmc)

[Bitcoin on the English Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bitcoin) (clearnet)

# List of Zites: Wikis | [[zite-list-wikis-talk|Talk]]

* [ZeroWiki EN](/138R53t3ZW7KDfSfxVpWUsMXgwUnsDNXLP/) - This Wiki

* [ZeroWiki FR](/135qYXdNpf5kTWYuTJ8uautsUi91Bhvcck/) - French ZeroWiki Clône

* [ZeroWiki ES](/1FwbupJhHcnFWGXuu3bn5VxcRVW9tx2tDQ) - Spanish ZeroWiki, Clon en Español

* [ZeroWiki PT](/1QJ8rDLmn4CE2VXpMotAi7bDryRmNLM7Rm/) - Portuguese ZeroWiki, mostly in Brazilian Portuguese (ZeroWiki em Português, mais em PT-BR)

* [ZeroWiki PL](/12Tt38zRJefsRMnAC9iai1CMSZ3PfiBDuY) - Polish ZeroWiki

* [BitcoinWiki EN](/1Pqq7TeAyCdVDqm2EN6PE9QVKHawzWyFmc) BitcoinWiki

* [InstallGentoo Wiki](/1d6VPcaEivcL9A2dy7Lu5sdouJm2NGe1q/) ZeroNet version of [InstallGentoo Wiki](https://wiki.installgentoo.com/)

* [0Nita](/1BrdUYNAbRt4P2Jxpgk5WhtKR2oLicBgcw) ziti italiani

* [New ZeroWiki](/1LX2wiouHctuUXtu5WkVM9TJJ3YoL6gAfm/) wiki by [[Krixano]]

# Git Center

Git Center is a decentralized hosting platform for Git repositories. It provides several collaboration features such as bug tracking for every project, and private and public repositories.

This is an decentralized alternative to GItHub/GitLab in ZeroNet.

## Links

[gitcenter.bit](/gitcenter.bit/) 
[1GitLiXB6t5r8vuU2zC6a8GYj9ME6HMQ4t](/1GitLiXB6t5r8vuU2zC6a8GYj9ME6HMQ4t/)

## Docs & References

1.  [ZeroNet Documentation](https://zeronet.readthedocs.io/en/latest/)

    [Unofficial clone of Documentation on ZeroNet](/1Docsfk5uLvuXkL4U13eYDxCm2gzi1fNQq/) #outdated

2. [ZeroNet Github repo](https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/Documentation/)

    [ZeroNet Git Repo hosted on ZeroNet](/1P4w4Rvh4vS9r6G5xTiSh8qEW87EKZtnJB/)
## Tutorials & Learning Resources

1.  [ZeroChat tutorial new](/Blog.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Post:99:ZeroChat+tutorial+new) #official #javascript
2.  [ZeroChat tutorial old](/Blog.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Post:46:ZeroNet+site+development+tutorial+2) #official #coffeescript
3.  [Zeronet Tutorials](/1Jtjb5CU9aod4jtz8hF5NPPqFKofRSsb4x/) #zerowiki #multisource
1.  [The Truth about ZeroNet](https://github.com/krixano/ZeroNet-Dev-Center/issues/28)

     Tutorials and zite examples written by imachug (gitcenter@zeroid.bit), including 13 chapters from understanding basic ZeroNet components to advanced topics like merger sites and merged content. **Great starting point for new developers.**
4.  [Tutorials on ZeroNet Dev Center](/14pM9huTYzJdyQyHRj6v2kfhMe8DrxwpGt/?/tutorials)
5.  [Kopi](/1KtzUsnmwc1Wr7KWWEGnWzmBSQoyH917Pz) 

    Kopi is a ZeroNet boilerplate with all the necessary elements to start a new project without the need to configure and develop the same features again and again.
6. [Zeroframe on NPM](https://www.npmjs.com/package/zeroframe)

7. [Zeronet/React example site](https://github.com/rllola/zeronet-react)

  Get started creating a zeronet site using react. Need to be updated.

8. [Github Awesome Meta List](https://github.com/sindresorhus/awesome)

    Just awesome ;)

9.  [Infected Security](/1KsRvAWe1XH6exU8SoTfgfr84vKhrkAqiS/)

   Windows security guides by @InfectSec

## Tools & Dev Services

1. [Mavo](/1F6Rt2QNMA6uJTSTZkDNBfXTd3unrtgcdJ/) #official #experimental

     ZeroNet storage plugin for Mavo that allows any web application created for this platform to run in a P2P and decentralized way without any modification. [[ref]](/Blog.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Post:113:ZeroNet+backed+for+Mavo)
1. [0git](/0git.bit/)

   Git repositories hosted on ZeroNet
1.  [CodeR](/1CodEr7T9xNXSPcwbsvf5fHTqsixDMwDzL/)

    JSFiddle and CodePen alternative
1. [Git Center](/1GitLiXB6t5r8vuU2zC6a8GYj9ME6HMQ4t/)

    Git Center is a decentralized hosting platform for Git repositories. Provides several collaboration features such as bug tracking for every project, and private and public repositories.
1. [Git over ZeroNet](/1xxooZ7s8iDz3u56i5mNQ1XGmwF8Zvnw9/)
1. [Static git repository page generator](/stagit.0git.bit/)
2.  [NullPaste](/1MgHVPCE1ve6QfKrgsqCURzRj72HrRWioz/) #pastebin
3.  [ZeroDB](/ZeroDB.bit/) #database #WIP

    Visual editor to create Dbschema files.
4.  [ZeroFrame Router](/1K2myjtjoEVpRC2JMieRL73ES4V4iLP2Ev/?/) #vue.js

    A very basic router that works with the ZeroFrame API.

## Devs & Opensource Projects

1.  [HelloZeroNet](https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/) #official #python #coffeescript

    [[Gitlab repo]](https://gitlab.com/HelloZeroNet/)
    [[Git Center repo]](/1P4w4Rvh4vS9r6G5xTiSh8qEW87EKZtnJB/)

    Repos of all ZeroNet official zites
2.  [AnthyG](https://github.com/AnthyG/)
    *   ThunderWave [[Git Center repo]](/1EjXEyudstY8dN3F8V5od9KoS1bkAerz9x/) #chatroom
    *   R_MD_ZN_Blog

        A beautiful Responsive Material-Design Blog for the ZeroNet
1. [Antilibrary.bit-ZeroNet-UI](https://github.com/antilibrary/Antilibrary.bit-ZeroNet-UI) #book-repo

   Front-End source code for the site Antilibrary.bit on ZeroNet
3.  [Kaffiene](https://github.com/April93/Kaffiene)

    ZeroNet search engine
4.  [Kopy Kate](https://github.com/kopy-kate/kopy-kate)

    Online streaming torrents based on WebTorrent and ZeroNet 
5.  [Krixano](https://github.com/krixano/) #vue.js
    *   ZeroNet Dev Center
    *   ZeroMedium [[Git Center repo]](/1BEPbMfV8QtaZCD2cPNbabfDKnmhTAZRPx)
    *   ZeroFrame Router
    *   ZeroDB [[Git Center repo]](/19t2vGe6Vmkou1rhJDjpsQoW8aCD2EWEFC/)
    *   Important Zites
6.  [mkg2001](https://github.com/mkg20001)
    *   ZeroNetJS #WIP

        A JS version of ZeroNet, using libp2p.
    *   ZeroNet-kivy #official #android #WIP
    *   [mkg20001's Git(Hub) Mirror](/1F7b27kT38nMYZQg7tvDr33qWDZQgwnQpw/)

        a small Git(Hub) mirror, where mirrors the Git projects of some people/organizations
1. [Money-Network](https://github.com/jaros1/Money-Network)

   Demo with complementary and alternative money. Implemented in ZeroNet and AngularJS. Focus on privacy, encryption, max data in client and min data on ZeroNet. Work in progress.
1.  [MuxZeroNet](https://github.com/MuxZeroNet)
    * ZeroMux

       Real time video transmuxing and streaming library designed for ZeroNet (Probably deprecated in favor of official big file support).
    * zerolib #WIP

      A Minimalist ZeroNet Protocol Library
1. [poster](https://github.com/grez911/poster) [[Git Center repo]](/173jgCe7oqQQAG8V4dNEDyHY4mFFWJKF1Q)

    A simple blog platform for ZeroNet written from scratch using Vue.js and Bulma.
1. [rllola](https://github.com/rllola)
  * zeroTube
  * zeronet-torrent-plugin
  * nanos-zeronet-app #incomplete

        POC application that allow you to create and to sign your ZeroNet website updates using the Ledger Nano S.
7.  [zer0net](https://github.com/zer0net)
    *   ZeroVoat #reddit-like
    *   IFS

        Intergalactic File Server
11.  [ZeroGreeter](/1Ps8mZHcKGdwtjmMLBJ9b8KU6ogEBrjEig) #vue.js

    ZeroHello alternative (source code is also available [in the zite](/presto.greeter.bit) folder)
8.  [ZeroNerds](https://github.com/ZeroNerds)
    *   ZeroMeReloaded

        Enhanced ZeroMe
    *   HelloZeroProxy

        Enhanced ZeroHello for clearnet proxy
9.  [ZeroMusic](https://github.com/Emeraude/ZeroMusic) #basic #coffeescript
1. [ZeroNetLabs](https://github.com/ZeroNetLabs)
    * ZeroWiki
    * kopi

       Kopi is a ZeroNet boilerplate with all the necessary elements to start a new project without the need to configure and develop the same features again and again.
1.  [Zirch](https://gitlab.com/liberit/zirch) #search-engine

## Dev Blogs
1. [ekaterina@blog](/1Kp5xdjQyrPth5mEJsn6NDBKZxcaeYz86N/)
  * ZeroDart #WIP

   ZeroNet support for Google's Dart programming language
  * ZeroQuotes
  * ZeroTodes
  * ZeroPolls
1. [Kaffie's Blog](/blog.kaffie.bit/)

   Kaffiene search engine and more.
1. [RVRE Blog](/1KxfpG5ssLZxorjR34GW1Zw9oWZBVL4VRi/) #search-engine
1. [ZeroBlog Lab](/1CiDoBP8RiWziqiBGEd8tQMy66A6fmnw2V/)

  ZeroMux blog and more.

1.  [ZeroNet Documentation](https://zeronet.readthedocs.io/en/latest/)

       Real time video transmuxing and streaming library designed for ZeroNet (Probably deprecated in favor of official big file support).
    * zerolib #WIP

      A Minimalist ZeroNet Protocol Library
1. [poster](https://github.com/grez911/poster) [[Git Center repo]](/173jgCe7oqQQAG8V4dNEDyHY4mFFWJKF1Q)

    A simple blog platform for ZeroNet written from scratch using Vue.js and Bulma.
1. [rllola](https://github.com/rllola)
  * zeroTube
  * zeronet-torrent-plugin
  * nanos-zeronet-app #incomplete

        POC application that allow you to create and to sign your ZeroNet website updates using the Ledger Nano S.
7.  [zer0net](https://github.com/zer0net)
    *   ZeroVoat #reddit-like
    *   IFS

        Intergalactic File Server
11.  [ZeroGreeter](/1Ps8mZHcKGdwtjmMLBJ9b8KU6ogEBrjEig) #vue.js

    ZeroHello alternative (source code is also available [in the zite](/presto.greeter.bit) folder)
8.  [ZeroNerds](https://github.com/ZeroNerds)
    *   ZeroMeReloaded

        Enhanced ZeroMe
    *   HelloZeroProxy

        Enhanced ZeroHello for clearnet proxy
9.  [ZeroMusic](https://github.com/Emeraude/ZeroMusic) #basic #coffeescript
1. [ZeroNetLabs](https://github.com/ZeroNetLabs)
    * ZeroWiki
    * kopi

       Kopi is a ZeroNet boilerplate with all the necessary elements to start a new project without the need to configure and develop the same features again and again.

## Tools & Dev Services

1. [Mavo](/1F6Rt2QNMA6uJTSTZkDNBfXTd3unrtgcdJ/) #official #experimental

     ZeroNet storage plugin for Mavo that allows any web application created for this platform to run in a P2P and decentralized way without any modification. [[ref]](/Blog.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Post:113:ZeroNet+backed+for+Mavo)
1. [0git](/0git.bit/)

   Git repositories hosted on ZeroNet
1.  [CodeR](/1CodEr7T9xNXSPcwbsvf5fHTqsixDMwDzL/)

    JSFiddle and CodePen alternative
1. [Git Center](/1GitLiXB6t5r8vuU2zC6a8GYj9ME6HMQ4t/)

    Git Center is a decentralized hosting platform for Git repositories. Provides several collaboration features such as bug tracking for every project, and private and public repositories.
